description: Developed a RESTful API for managing dynamic payment approval requests using Stripe APIs and Webhooks, leveraging Node.js and PostgreSQL to enable users to submit payment requests seamlessly to their stakeholder

Implemented a payments view with advanced filtering, sorting, and pagination features using Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, enabling users to efficiently reconcile money movement and manage transactions
